item.title: Resource image
item.description: Resource image Tutorial demonstrates how to resize an image on Hugo site before inserting it in html. This technique is applied when original images are large but have to be embedded as small one to reduce page load time (e.g. in the context of image gallery). Materials used: Page resources. Image processing. Hugo resource image example. Hugo image resize on Stack Overflow #1. Hugo image resize on Stack Overflow #2.
